message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DC, cs.SI, cs.DS 

The paper proposes a framework for decentralized, online learning which involves trading off rewards and costs. This falls under the category of machine learning and artificial intelligence, specifically in the sub-field of reinforcement learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of this framework in Big Data mining, event detection in surveillance sensor networks, and distributed online recommendation systems, which are all related to data science and distributed computing. Hence, the other likely sub-categories are cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing), cs.SI (Social and Information Networks), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
